definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.chinese: 这种新式火箭由军方进行了广泛的测试和调试。

sentences.english: In this paper a new type of frequency-hopped frequency synthesiser is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种新式的跳频频率合成器。

sentences.english: Introduced in the paper is a newly developed centring-roll system used on the rotary pipe mill.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种用于斜轧钢管生产的新式定心辊装置。

sentences.english: In Paris, France, years ago, a new type of pedestrian appeared.
sentences.chinese: 多年以前，在法国巴黎，出现了一种新式的步行方式。

sentences.english: The binder system about cationic guar gum is most active field of research.
sentences.chinese: 阳离子瓜尔胶的新式捆绑系统是研究的热点。

sentences.english: The new double-cassette recorder was a hot number in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 这种新式的双卡录音机成了这家商店的畅销货。

sentences.english: The word 'new' has really been flogged to death in advertisements, and nobody believes it any more.
sentences.chinese: “新式”这个词在广告里都用滥了，没人再相信了。

sentences.english: School destruction is a group aggro to destroy new education.
sentences.chinese: 毁学是一种群体性破坏新式教育的暴力行为。

sentences.english: The improved farm tools are efficient as well as easy to handle.
sentences.chinese: 新式农具既轻巧，又出活。

sentences.english: Wollstonecraft proposed the program of the development of new women's education.
sentences.chinese: 沃斯通克拉夫特提出了发展新式女性教育的方案。

sentences.english: Please have a look at the hand embroidered one with a new design of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 请看这块手绣的有新式竹子图案的台布。

sentences.english: A connector for building is composed of plug and socket.
sentences.chinese: 一种新式建筑用接插件，多用于支撑结构和脚手架中。

sentences.english: 'It will take a long time to transition to a new form of television, ' Mr. Stringer said.
sentences.chinese: 斯金格说，让人们适应一种新式电视机需要很长时间。

sentences.english: The new sedan was introduced to the public with a lot of whoopla.
sentences.chinese: 这种新式轿车被大吹大擂地介绍给了公众。

sentences.english: New-style cooks include an understanding of the physical and chemical properties of foods when they explore ingredient combinations.
sentences.chinese: 新式厨师要求探究成分组成时熟悉食品理化性质。

sentences.english: New-age futuristic “Line” sunglasses design from MACKDADDY.
sentences.chinese: 来自MACKDADDY的新式未来主义太阳镜。

definition: to copy/to imitate/to make by imitating a model
standardized/standard (service, method etc)/regulation (clothing etc)/formulaic/(telecommunications etc) system/format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)
Western (or Western-style) cannon of the Ming era
to copy/to produce sth after a model/to counterfeit
